```{r}
library(datasets)
data(airquality)
summary(airquality)
```

Let's first make a pairs plot of the data.

```{r}
pairs(airquality)
```

Here's a regression model of ozone, wind, solar radiation and temperature.

```{r}
library(stats)
fit <- lm (Ozone~Wind + Solar.R + Temp, data = airquality)
    summary(fit)
```
